traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The aldani can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The aldani makes two attacks with its claws.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Mele Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 +1) slashing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 11). The aldani has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target.
